She did not have much to say on Lee's actions, but rather on the voters in the district. My focus is on the constituents in teh district, and my goal is that they are all well looked after and have access to all the constituent services they need during this time of transition, said Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand ,( D) New York. Kirsten Gillibrand did work closely with Lee to craft legislation for the families of Flight 3407 victims. went back and forth in our heads, we never went back and forth in our hearts.'' Saying his`` heart was in Indiana,'' Mike Pence said he would continue to meet with the good and strong and opinionated people of this state before deciding his next move. During a question-and-answer session, Mike Pence said his proudest moment as a congressman came when he helped a Muncie mother avoid deportation to her home country of Sierra Leone.
